CustomField.formula: IF ( TEXT(Rule_Type__c) = 'Docketing', IF( YearsToCal__c > 0, TEXT(YearsToCal__c) + ' Year(s) ','') + IF (Count__c>0 ,TEXT(Operator__c) + TEXT(Count__c) + ' ' + TEXT(Period_Type__c) + ' ','') + IF (Count1__c>0, TEXT(Operator1__c) + TEXT(Count1__c) + ' ' + TEXT(Period_Type1__c),'') , IF( StartYearsToCal__c > 0, TEXT(StartYearsToCal__c) + ' Year(s) ','') + IF(Start_Count__c > 0, TEXT(Start_Operator__c) + TEXT( Start_Count__c) + ' ' + TEXT(Start_Period_Type__c) ,'') + IF(Start_Count1__c > 0, TEXT(Start_Operator1__c) + TEXT( Start_Count1__c) + ' ' + TEXT(Start_Period_Type1__c) ,'') + ' > ' + IF(Close_Count__c>0, TEXT(Close_Operator__c) + TEXT( Close_Count__c) + ' ' + TEXT(Close_Period_Type__c) ,'') + IF(Close_Count1__c>0, TEXT(Close_Operator1__c) + TEXT( Close_Count1__c) + ' ' + TEXT(Close_Period_Type1__c) ,'') )
CustomField.label: Calculation
